title: Tonto National Monument: Archive
body: News Release Archive           Subscribe  | What is RSS     November 04, 2015  Tonto Honors Veterans Day with Fee Free Day  Tonto National Monument will honor veterans and their families by providing all monument visitors with a Fee Free Day this Veterans Day, Nov. 11.   October 09, 2015  Learn about Archeology  Tonto National Monumentâ€™s archeologist will provide visitors with an archeological program and discuss preservation techniques at the Lower Cliff Dwelling from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. Oct. 17, to celebrate International Archeology Day.   September 22, 2015  Entrance Fee Increase Begins October 1, 2015  Tonto National Monument will increase the entrance fee from $3 to $5 per person starting October 1st. Park passes, like the Senior Pass and Annual Pass, are still valid for entry.   February 14, 2015  Heritage Days 2015  Heritage Days 2015   June 09, 2014  Fire Restrictions in Effect  Fire Restrictions are now in effect for Tonto National Monument and surrounding U.S. Forest Service areas.   May 16, 2014  New Superintendent at Tonto National Monument  Duane Hubbard, a 14-year federal employee, has been named Superintendent of Tonto National Monument.
